author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA STRENGTHENS INTO A MAJOR HURRICANE FAR SOUTH-SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary: ...IONA STRENGTHENS INTO A MAJOR HURRICANE FAR SOUTH-SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 PM HST Mon Jul 28 the center of Iona was located near 10.8, -153.2 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 964 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA STRENGTHENS INTO A MAJOR HURRICANE FAR SOUTH-SOUTHEAST OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 PM HST Mon Jul 28 the center of Iona was located near 10.8, -153.2 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 964 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Iona (CP1/CP012025)
